title: How to Learn the Multiplication Table Easily?
excerpt: Methods and tricks for memorizing the multiplication table without tedious repetition.
author: Smart Worksheets Team
content:
Why is the Multiplication Table So Important?

Mastery of the multiplication table is the foundation for most math topics: division, fractions, percentages, and more. Here are some ways to make memorization easier.

Multiples of 9 - The Finger Method

Hold both hands in front of you. If you want to calculate 9 times 4, fold down your fourth finger (from the left). How many fingers remain on the left? 3. How many on the right? 6. The answer is 36.

Multiples of 5

Every result must end in 0 or 5. That's easy and fun to remember.

Daily Practice

Print a practice sheet from our multiplication generator and hang it on the fridge.
